text_block_list.name: Fans
text_block_list.text: Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Fans
text_block_list.text: TIC-KE-ZO! TIC-KE-ZO!

The ecstatic chants of the new champion's name ring out toward the 
track.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hah! You hearing this?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I expected no less. That was an outstanding Derby!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Aaah… The Derby! I won the… I won the…

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Geez, you beat me fair and square.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: It was the only possible path. Yours was truly the road to victory.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Taishin! Hayahide!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: That was the best race… The best Derby ever! And it was ours!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
But it won't go this way next time. In the Kikuka Sho, it'll be my turn 
to win.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Yeah, our goal isn't just the Derby. There's still plenty of races to go.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Totally! And we'll run them all together! Let's go for it! To what's 
beyond the Derby!

The cheers for Winning Ticket from outside can be heard through the 
whole length of the runners' tunnel.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: That's quite a chant. You can hear it across the entire racetrack.
I think Tickezo's enthusiasm may have spread to all her fans.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah, Traineeer!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I did it! I won the Derby! It feels like I'm dreaming!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
Congratulations, Winning Ticket. Hehe, are you sure you didn't want 
to take in more of that applause?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hehe, sure, but there's interviews to do.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
And, you know, this won't be the last I hear it. There's gonna be tons 
of chances in the future!

Yes. She fulfilled her dream of conquering the Derby, but this isn't 
the end.
Because her story will go on.
choice_data_list: Make them chant your name again and again!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Let's make it happen together!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
All right, Ms. Tazuna! Let's get to those interviews! I gotta make up 
for missing the prerace press conference!

text_block_list.name: Interviewer
text_block_list.text:
And now, the racer who won the Derby in spectacular fashion—please 
welcome Winning Ticket!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Heehee, thank you very much!

text_block_list.name: Interviewer
text_block_list.text:
First, hearing the audience chant your name after the race—how did it 
make you feel?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I gave my all to make this the best Derby ever, so I was really happy 
that everyone watching picked up on it!

text_block_list.name: Interviewer
text_block_list.text:
You raced against your BNW rivals today. What was the key to your 
victory?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I trained a whole lot, for sure, but what really motivated me…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Was my dream of winning the Derby, and the promise I made with my 
bestie rivals. That, and…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I really wanted to make my trainer a Derby trainer for being so 
supportive all this time!

text_block_list.name: Interviewer
text_block_list.text: One last thing. A message from the Derby winner!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
My name's Winning Ticket, and I'm the winner of the greatest Derby 
ever!
